name: Veggie Pitas with Tzatziki
description: About the author: Carolyn Cope writes Umami Girl and manages a CSA in New Jersey....
recipeIngredient: 1/4 small red onion, very thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place each pita on a plate. In a strip in the center, place half of the cucumbers, carrot, and onion in each. Drizzle generously with tzatziki. Fold and serve.
